website_summaries.verdict: This sit-on-top stands out for its tracking and stability on the water.
pros: Tracks in a straight line, even when paddling hard
cons: The seat is a little on the narrow side, and you may want to upgrade it with better cushioning

customer_reviews.title: Look no further... get out on the water!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Kayak Frenzy that we have purchased!!! We love the design and how they stack into each other easily. To make me even happier, they fit in the underbay of my RV!!!! These handle beautifully in the water -- they are much tougher to tip than a canoe. When I was in my 20's, I taught canoeing and kayaking, so I have "tested" several dozen models of small watercraft -- these are my favorite!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mighty Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Kayak! At 260 lbs 6'4" it fits me perfectly. Tracks very straight. The greatest was Amazon's delivery!! Directly to my home.
customer_reviews.author: Perry flugge

customer_reviews.title: Cracks appeared after one year of use.
customer_reviews.text: A little bit heavy on the ground, but awesome on water! Seats are not for plus-size people. Update after one year of use: tiny cracks near holes in two kayaks !
customer_reviews.author: BelaVezha

customer_reviews.title: Great Kayak
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and as advertised---hard to tell from website, but it does come with the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous NC

customer_reviews.title: Go have some fun and get an Ocean Kayak!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. I tested other kayaks at a local rental shop and found the Ocean Kayak to be much better at tracking than the others...looks cool too! I purchased the orange/yellow. The shipment arrived on time and the delivery guys were a helping hand.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: ... lot of current and some rocks and I feel like I am safe in my frenzy it’s like a ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kayak to do the salt River on there’s quite a few spots where you do have some ups and downs a lot of current and some rocks and I feel like I am safe in my frenzy it’s like a tank it just goes through the water the waves go over it it’s perfect for when I bought it for
customer_reviews.author: Azinsurancelady

customer_reviews.title: This is a good one
customer_reviews.text: This kayak tracks well, and has GREAT STABILIZATION. However, the seat sat a little too straight for me. Note that I do have problems with disks in my lower back. I have started a return on this, but that is the only reason. If you don't have problems with sitting up very straight, this is a great kayak!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does your Kayak fit ?
customer_reviews.text: Good product, my only issue is it has a narrow cockpit area, only 18.5 " It is a "SOT" Kayak but you are still sitting in thee cockpit opening and this can be uncomfortable for a big guy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice kayak, but did not come with a paddle. Luckily we had one.
customer_reviews.author: cjnna.

customer_reviews.title: A perfect boat for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Very stable, tracks well, comfortable. Zero complaints. Love it. Just wish I'd bought it directly from the seller, would have been cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: eldorado59970

customer_reviews.title: In my opinion its one of the better sit on top kayaks
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion its one of the better sit on top kayaks. You do need a proper back support, but it handles very well, it is very tough, it has a higher than average weight limit and quite stable. I have taken mine on rivers, lakes, surfing, and even under the Golden Gate bridge (mind the currents, stay near shore, and a good wetsuit is smart). So if you want a beginning to moderate/advanced yak, this one is really hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Wolter

customer_reviews.title: Pleased overall
customer_reviews.text: Overall I’m well pleased. My complaints would be this. It doesn’t have a ‘well’ to put in your keys or phone or camera. And it’s noisy when even the tiniest waves are out it ‘laps’ loudly on the kayak. I assume this is cause of the bigger keel on the bottom for stability and steering.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: It easy to carry...and can keep up with the 12 kayaks!
customer_reviews.text: I love this kayak! It’s easy to paddle, and only 9 feet long, so I can carry it by myself. The side handles are perfect. My friends have 12 foot kayaks, but I can hang with them on my frenzy. It’s great exercise and stable when the big boats send their waves my way! I love it. It may even fit it my van ???
customer_reviews.author: Chip

customer_reviews.title: Paddle On!
customer_reviews.text: These kayaks are lightweight yet very sturdy. They are easy to maneuver and track very nicely in the water.
customer_reviews.author: C R Myers

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Multipurpose kayak with utility for transport and storage and use on the water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great surfing sit on top!
customer_reviews.text: Used this boat for surfing. This is a very responsive sit on top to be as stable as it is. love it!
customer_reviews.author: wendal floyd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great kayak and easy to maneuver - would definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Ugast Hudson

customer_reviews.title: They were perfect for whatever Lake Superior wanted to throw at us
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Ocean Kayak Frenzy. We purchased this one for my boyfriend so that we can use the kayaks when we went to Pictured Rocks in Michigan. They were perfect for whatever Lake Superior wanted to throw at us :) We got the sunrise color and its very pretty in person! And very visible on the water for other boaters. Now I want to purchase a new one because the colors were so bright next to my early 2000's Ocean Kayak Frenzy. And I like the updated graphics much better than mine!! I'm a huge fan of Ocean Kayaks! Highly recommend this kayak for lake or ocean kayaking!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Tracks very well. Buy small scupper plugs if you don't want to get wet.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had bought this sooner
customer_reviews.text: Nice versatile little kayak! Got this to add another kayak to my fleet. Ran Class II rapids this past weekend and love this purchase! Needed something more nimble for fast moving rivers. I'll be trying this in the ocean breakers later this summer. I kind of like the snug seat - you feel secure and in-control. The supplied foam seat is adequate as long as you're not spending 8 hours on-board; may want an upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: D. ONEIL

customer_reviews.title: Great little kayak
customer_reviews.text: So much fun. Easy to carry and load. What a blast. I added the scupper plugs to stay dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising!
customer_reviews.text: I love the kayak. But the way it was pictured on Amazon I thought I was buying two not one single kayak, it makes me think ‘false advertising’ why picture 2 together? All others are single except when 2 are sold together. I’m not a very happy kayaker!
customer_reviews.author: V. Dannels

customer_reviews.title: great in rough water
customer_reviews.text: Great kayak for the ocean. Once you have a decent idea of what you are doing this kayak can easily ride up and through some pretty big breaking waves. I've used used it to surf my way into the shore on some relatively big waves too. Even when waves crash on top of you the water quickly filters out and you can keep on going. A family member of mine used this kayak as well and he was too big for it. His weight made it easy to tip over and he is about 275lbs. I'm 190lbs and I'd say its good for anyone 240lbs or less.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner Kayak
customer_reviews.text: Great kayak for a beginner. I purchased two of these locally for what Amazon is charging, but mine came with two seats and two paddles. This is the newer model of the Frenzy. The old modelis about a hundred bucks cheaper but I think this one tracks better. I purchased two center hatch kits from Amazon for half the price Ocean Kayak wanted on their site and installed them myself in a couple of hours with no problem.time out had a dolphin encounter!
customer_reviews.author: KeysBadge

customer_reviews.title: Love this kayak
customer_reviews.text: Love this kayak! I used to have a Wilderness System but it was too heavy and more then I needed, sold it and got the Ocean Frenzy. I can carry it easily (5'8 130Ibs). It fits everything I need for a kayak trip.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Gristwood

customer_reviews.title: The first one was orange and the color always stayed nice and bright no fades changes due in part that ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these kayaks over the last 5 years. The first one was orange and the color always stayed nice and bright no fades changes due in part that I keep mine indoors. Very stable and fun going face first against the surf in California.
customer_reviews.author: TUZO

product_meta.title: Ocean Kayak Frenzy One-Person Sit-On-Top Recreational Kayak
product_meta.description: Offering big fun in a compact hull, the Ocean Kayak Frenzy sit-on-top recreational kayak is a versatile choice for ocean or river adventurers. Responsive and stable, this one-person kayak is playful in the surf but behaves well on flat water. Ocean Kayak's renowned Tri-Form hull combines primary and secondary stability, with a long center keel to keep you going straight. A durable, four-way-adjustable Comfort Plus seat supports all-day paddling, with comfort for any body type. Store gear, food, and other items using the stern tank well with removable bungees and bow deck bungee. Easily carry the Frenzy from boat to launch using the molded-in side handles and bow and stern carrying handles. Measures 9 feet long and weighs 43 pounds for easy transport on a car top; capacity of 275 to 325 pounds; lifetime warranty on the hull.
feature_bullets: Responsive and stable, this one-person kayak is playful in the surf but behaves well on flat water.
Ocean Kayak's renowned Tri-Form hull combines primary and secondary stability, with a long center keel to keep you going straight.
A durable, four-way-adjustable Comfort Plus seat supports all-day paddling, with comfort for any body type.
Store gear, food, and other items using the stern tank well with removable bungees and bow deck bungee.
Easily carry the Frenzy from boat to launch using the molded-in side handles and bow and stern carrying handles.
Measures 9 feet long and weighs 43 pounds for easy transport on a car top; capacity of 325 pounds; lifetime warranty on the hull.
